Package inf101.chess.view

package inf101.chess.view
  • Class
    Description
    ChessDummyGraphics
     
    ChessGraphics
    Interface created by Martin Vatshelle.
    ChessGUI
    Adapted from GameGUI by Martin Vatshelle.
    ChessMenu
    This class represents a main menu with settings and an option to start the game of chess.
    ClickableChessGrid
    Inspired by ClickableGrid by: Anna Eilertsen - anna.eilertsen@uib.no Martin Vatshelle - martin.vatshelle@uib.no The grid has been edited so that it also shows a little circle on panels where the current player can move their piece to.
    GamePanel
    Adapted from GamePanel by: Anna Eilertsen - anna.eilertsen@uib.no Martin Vatshelle - martin.vatshelle@uib.no So that it can hold pieces.
    RoundedBorder
